title: The date on the lockscreen cuts off. Rather than show Oct., 26 for example, it just shows Oct.,
content:
Basically on the lockscreen I want to be able to see the full date, there is more than enough room, however for some reason the system only ever shows the month, followed by ... There seems to be no setting that I can find that forces it to show the full date, and it is rather annoying not being able to just quickly pull up my phone and check the date and time all at once from the lock screen.

I have gone through all the options to see if I could change it to always display full date, I have also googled this issue, where I found someone else was having the same problem, however there was no solution for the problem, they simply concluded it must be a big.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
